        Returns:

      • getPlayerUniqueId

        public UUID getPlayerUniqueId()

      • isSpectating

        public boolean isSpectating()
        True if the player is currently spectating.
        This includes spectators switching worlds as the player was spectating and will be as soon as switching is complete.

      • setSpectating

        public void setSpectating(boolean spectating)
        Enables or disables the spectator mode on this player.
        Parameters:
        spectating - true to enable the spectator mode.

      • setSpectating

        public void setSpectating(boolean spectating,
                          boolean silent)
        Enables or disables the spectator mode on this player.
        Parameters:
        spectating - true to enable the spectator mode.
        silent - true to silently enable or disable the spectator mode.

      • setSpectating

        public void setSpectating(boolean spectating,
                          org.bukkit.command.CommandSender executor)
        Enables or disables the spectator mode on this player.
        Parameters:
        spectating - true to enable the spectator mode.
        executor - the player, console or command block ordering the spectator mode change.

      • setSpectating

        public void setSpectating(boolean spectating,
                          org.bukkit.command.CommandSender executor,
                          boolean silent)
        Enables or disables the spectator mode on this player.
        Parameters:
        spectating - true to enable the spectator mode.
        executor - the player, console or command block ordering the spectator mode change.
        silent - true to silently enable or disable the spectator mode.

      • setSpectating

        public void setSpectating(boolean spectating,
                          org.bukkit.command.CommandSender executor,
                          boolean silent,
                          boolean worldChange)
        Enables or disables the spectator mode on this player.
        Parameters:
        spectating - true to enable the spectator mode.
        executor - the player, console or command block ordering the spectator mode change.
        silent - true to silently enable or disable the spectator mode.
        worldChange - true if the spectator mode is changed due to a world change. Internal use.

      • saveSpectatorModeInFile

        public void saveSpectatorModeInFile(boolean spectating)
        Saves in a file the spectating status of this player. The saved status will be used when the player log-ins.
        Parameters:
        spectating - true to save the spectator mode; false to clean it from the file.

      • resetScoreboard

        public void resetScoreboard()
        Resets the player's scoreboard to the one

        public void setTeleporting(boolean teleporting)

      • isGamemodeChangeAllowed

        public boolean isGamemodeChangeAllowed()
        True if the player can change his gamemode.

        Used to bypass the gamemode lock when using the no-clip mode.

      • setGamemodeChangeAllowed

        public void setGamemodeChangeAllowed(boolean gamemodeChangeAllowed)

      • setGameMode

        public void setGameMode(org.bukkit.GameMode mode)
        Changes the gamemode of the player, bypassing the locked mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - The new gamemode.

        The arena the spectator is in.

      • getLastDeathMessage

        public String getLastDeathMessage()
        The last death message for this player, with his name replaced by "You", and "Name was" replaced by "You were".

        Example: « You starved to death ».

        Null if the player was never dead.

      • setLastDeathMessage

        public void setLastDeathMessage(String lastDeathMessage)

      • getDeathLocation

        public org.bukkit.Location getDeathLocation()
        The location of the last death.

        Null if no death registered.

      • setDeathLocation

        public void setDeathLocation(org.bukkit.Location deathLocation)

      • isHiddenFromTp

        public boolean isHiddenFromTp()
        Whether the player is hidden from the spectator teleportation GUI.

        Whether the player was spectating before they changed worlds.
